Model.Ship

Interface IShip

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ship

    public interface IShip

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point[] getCoordinates()
      Calculates all points, where this ship is represented
      int gethitPoints()
      Every ship got a number of hit-points, which is initialized with the size of the ship
      java.util.ArrayList<Point> getPlacementMarkers()
      Get points which have been marked as not valid for placement, due to this ship
      Point getPosEnd() 
      Point[] getPosition()
      The position of a ship is represented by a start-point and a end-point

      Gets the size of the selected ship, valid sizes are 2, 3, 4 and 5

    • Method Detail

      • gethitPoints

        int gethitPoints()
        Every ship got a number of hit-points, which is initialized with the size of the ship
        Returns:
        The number of the remaining hit-points

      • sethitPoints

        void sethitPoints(int hitPoints)
        Every ship got a number of hit-points, which is initialized with the size of the ship
        Parameters:
        hitPoints - Set the number of the hit-points left on the selected ship

      • getPosition

        Point[] getPosition()
        The position of a ship is represented by a start-point and a end-point
        Returns:
        The start- and endpoint of the ship

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Gets the size of the selected ship, valid sizes are 2, 3, 4 and 5
        Returns:
        The size of the ship

      • getCoordinates

        Point[] getCoordinates()
        Calculates all points, where this ship is represented
        Returns:
        Point Array with all coordiantes of the ship

      • getPlacementMarkers

        java.util.ArrayList<Point> getPlacementMarkers()
        Get points which have been marked as not valid for placement, due to this ship
        Returns:
        An Array of Points representing the Fields which got marked as not placeable

      • setPlacementMarkers

        void setPlacementMarkers(java.util.ArrayList<Point> placementMarkers)
        Set points which have been marked as not valid for placement, due to this ship
        Parameters:
        placementMarkers - An Array of Points representing the Fields which got marked as not placeable

      • getPosStart

        Point getPosStart()
        Returns:
        The starposition of the selected ship

      • getPosEnd

        Point getPosEnd()
        Returns:
        The endposition of the selected ship
